epd_metadata.epd_owner_address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
epd_metadata.epd_produced_by_address: Level 3, Greenhouse, 180 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000 Australia
epd_metadata.epd_process_certified_by_address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA
epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

product_description.product_use: Concrete prepared by mixing cement, coarse and fine aggregates, and water, with or without auxiliary agents and additives. Used for construction applications including residential and commercial foundations, driveways, footpaths, high-rise buildings, dams, spillways, roads, bridges, and public works infrastructure.

product_classes.normal_class: Designed for everyday applications such as residential and commercial foundations, driveways and footpaths.
product_classes.special_class: Supplied to major construction projects with technical parameters including high-strength, high durability, marine application, post-tensioned, high-pumpability, super workable, piling concrete, architectural off-form finishes and decorative applications.

product_description.hazardous_substances: None of the products contain substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for authorisation exceeding 0.1% by weight.
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging.

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not specified; scope is cradle to delivery
lca_information.time_representativeness: Plant data from 2022 calendar year; mix data from 2023 calendar year

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight at quarry and m³ of concrete at batching plant; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered without packaging except packaging of materials

data_quality.geographic_representativeness: Good to very good across all states
data_quality.temporal_representativeness: Data updated within 10 years as required

installation.operational_control: Holcim does not have operational control over installation
installation.assumptions: Based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool; includes pouring from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation activities

deconstruction.process: Physical drilling and removal using hydraulic excavator

benefits_and_loads_beyond_system_boundar.recycled_aggregate_use: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of all construction materials to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process where concrete absorbs CO2 from atmosphere through chemical reaction with hydration products
carbonation.consideration: Not included in this EPD; recommended to consider in whole-of-life building studies per BS EN 16757:2017
carbonation.impact: Can offset CO2 emitted during cement manufacturing, reducing net emissions over lifetime

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Allocated economically due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data: Default background data from LCA databases used; AusLCI dataset conforms to EN 15804 allocation rules

additional_info.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

contact_information.address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney, NSW 2060, Australia

disclaimers: Results are relative statements and do not indicate endpoints, threshold values, safety margins or risks.
Certain impact categories have high uncertainties or limited experience.
Ionizing radiation indicator excludes effects from nuclear accidents, occupational exposure, and radioactive waste disposal underground.
